description:
Queen Nefertari Titi was Princess http://anidb.net/ch2940 [Vivi]`s mother and http://anidb.net/ch3060 [King Cobra]`s wife.
Twenty years ago, Titi was seen alive, four years before Vivi was born, with http://anidb.net/ch3031 [Igaram] as Cobra remarked about the dangerous era they were entering.
She died at some point when Vivi was very young. She has been dead for at least eleven years as she was absent in all of Vivi`s flashbacks for that period. Vivi is supposedly a spitting image of her mother; so much so that when she was dressed up for her coming of age ceremony, Cobra almost mistook Vivi for her late mother.
name: Nefertari Titi
